item.description:
LIMITED TIME - $12 POWER DEAL for Fantasy Chocolate Networking Mixer with Finger Food Buffet! (reg. $25)

Get deal tickets here: http://fantasychocolatenetworking-aug2011.eventbrite.com

Think chocolate and networking can't go together? Well, that's what you'll be doing on the last night of August at District Lounge! Get your deal tickets and enjoy this networking mixer with lots of adventure:

  • Unlimited chocolate tastings from our chocolate towers, dipping bowls, platters and cocktail glasses
  • Finger food buffet which includes chicken bites, calamari, assorted vegies, sweet potato fries, hummus, pastry and more
  • The ever-popular Boston After Six Goodie Bag stuffed with favors and gifts from our event sponsors

Bring lots of business cards, your sweet tooth and your most powerful networking tactics!

Proof of ticket is required to enter the event. There will be no door sales.

21+ event. Cash bar. Club dress code applies (no sneakers, boots, jeans, hoodies or athletic gear).

Event venue: Red Sky Restaurant & Lounge, 16-18 North Street, Boston, MA 02109 (near Aquarium and State St. T Stations; ample parking)

Get deal tickets here: http://fantasychocolatenetworking-aug2011.eventbrite.com

Presented by BostonAfterSix.com
item.name: $12 Fantasy Chocolate Networking Mixer with Finger Food Buffet!
